item.name: Age of Mythology: The Boardgame
item.comment: Only after one play. I will play more. Seems like some tweeks could make the game better, but I will say more after more plays with the out of the box rules.

item.name: Agricola
item.comment: I did not like this game at first, but it has begun to grow on me a bit.

item.name: Aladdin's Dragons
item.comment: Needs to be played with the advanced rules

item.name: Bootleggers
item.comment: One play with three players. It seems like it would be better with more because the cards would turn over faster. I assume rating could go up.

item.name: Brew Crafters
item.comment: I met Ben at the WBC and had the chance to play a game of Brew Crafters. Needless to say, it was my personal favorite of the con. I need this game and will go to Kickstarter in October. It had a similar feel to Agricola, but had a beer theme and was better in my opinion.

item.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: The Game
Carcassonne: Hunters and Gatherers
item.comment: I like this version more that the original. Hunters make more sense than the farmers and the tiles seem more balanced.

item.name: Catan
item.comment: My rating of 6 is after well over 100 plays of this game. I rated it a 10 when I first started playing. Now it is a game of whoever gets the best dice rolls.

item.name: Catan Histories: Settlers of America – Trails to Rails
Clash of the Gladiators
item.comment: Not as deep as a usual Reiner Knizia game. Much dice rolling.

item.name: Dracula
item.comment: Only one play so far, but I really enjoyed it.

item.name: Galloping Pigs
item.comment: I play this with my 4 year old. She has done some truely nasty moves in this game. This has made me very proud!

item.name: Hellas
item.comment: I have only played two times. The second playing was much more enjoyable than the first.

item.name: Ivanhoe
item.comment: After 2 plays. Has a "Taj Mahal" light feel to it.

item.name: James Ernest's Totally Renamed Spy Game
Kitty Chaos
item.comment: The game locks up a little bit. We played a 2-player game and both of us were on the road, but only had cards that can be played when someone is not on the road. I think the theme is cute and this could have been a good kids game with better card distribution.

item.name: Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation
Lord of the Rings: The Search
Lunar Rails
item.comment: Feels different from the other games in the Empire Builder series. It can be difficult to tell green from blue and red from brown due to the grey background.

item.name: Manifest Destiny
item.comment: Played 1.5 times. Rating may change.

item.name: Marco Polo Expedition
item.comment: After reading the rules, I thought this sounded bad. After two playings, it is better than I expected. Not great, but decent and fast.

item.name: The Powerpuff Girls: Saving the World Before Bedtime
Risk: The Lord of the Rings
Silverton
item.comment: I think this game has a great mechanic. The problem is that players starting in Denver hardly ever win.

item.name: Snail's Pace Race
item.comment: Can be fun with young children, or gambling adults! :)

item.name: Star Wars: Episode 1 – Clash of the Lightsabers
TransAmerica
item.comment: I did not like this game with the first playing. It has steadily been growing on me.

item.name: Trivial Pursuit: Star Wars Classic Trilogy Collector's Edition
Wadjet
item.comment: I could not wait for the game to end, but that never seemed to come. I finally made a guess and was wrong. It was better than the alternative to continue.
